    @allure.title("Start new deal")
    def test_start_deal(self, page: Page, create_session):
        deal_details_page = DealDetailsPage(page)
        login_page = LoginPage(page)
        notifications = Notifications(page)
        deals_api = DealsApi()
        failed_message = "Available balance {}"
    
        with allure.step("Test preparation"):
            ready_deals = deals_api.get_ready_deals()
            total_deals = ready_deals['total']
            deal_id = ready_deals['items'][0]['id']
    
            if total_deals == 0:
                pytest.skip("There are no deals in Ready status")
            login_page.goto()
            create_session()
    
        with allure.step(f"Go to deals details page with id: {deal_id}"):
            deal_details_page.goto(endpoint=deal_details_page.slug.format(deal_id))
    
        with allure.step("Get available balance"):
            available_balance = deals_api.get_deal_available_balance(deal_id)
    
        with allure.step("Force start a deal"):
            deal_details_page.click_force_start_btn()
    
        with allure.step("Verify deal start"):
            if float(available_balance) <= 10:
                assert notifications.wait_for_unsuccessful_toast() is True
                available_balance = str(available_balance)[:5]
>               assert failed_message.format(available_balance) in notifications.get_unsuccessful_toast_message()
